name: Warrior Spirit (itch)
description:
So this is my entry for the Linux Game Jam 2018! Aaand I didn't get anywhere close to my original plans, haha ^^;
My versatile verb was going to be 'Fight'. I planned to have a game about a warrior spirit cursed with the task of helping everyday people out with they're non-violent issue. Basically exploring what conflict and struggle mean.
Instead I got a neat intro and first level slapped together, so there you go.
That said, I learned quite a bit and might even try another RPG Maker MV game now that I know what I can do with it, roughly.
The font is La-Unica by Estefania Hormingo
Some stock art from the engine is in the intro, along with a sprite by DesrazDragons (though I tweaked and animated it a bit).
All the weird crappy art is all me :D
===============Controls=====================
Move with the arrow keys and interact with the space bar; daz it.
